scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && mkdir -p dist/audio && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/index.js --platform=browser --format=esm --define:process.env.API_KEY=\""$API_KEY"\" --external:react --external:react-dom/ --external:react/ --external:@google/genai && cp index.html dist/index.html && node scripts/post-build.js && cp metadata.json dist/metadata.json && if [ -d "audio" ] && [ "$(ls -A audio)" ]; then cp -R audio/* dist/audio/; else echo "Audio directory is empty or does not exist, skipping copy."; fi
